description:
Kenshin sets out to honor his promises to both fight Aoshi and bring him back alive to Misao.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Söz Verilen Vakit Geldi: Aoshi ve Kenshin Yeniden Dövüşüyor
Yakusoku o Hatasu Toki: Aoshi to Kenshin no Saisen!
กลับมาทวงสัญญาศึกนี้ระหว่างเคนชินกับอาโอชิ
約束を果たす時・蒼紫と剣心の再戦!
